definition: Hmong or Miao ethnic group of southwest China/surname Miao

sentences.english: The nursery should open fertilizer sources, manure and planting perennial green manure.
sentences.chinese: 苗圃要廣開肥源，常年積肥和種植綠肥。

sentences.english: In the middle or center of your raised bed , plant lettuce of your favorite variety.
sentences.chinese: 在你苗圃牀的中心種植你最喜愛品種的萵苣。

sentences.english: The farmer bedded the seedlings in.
sentences.chinese: 農民把秧苗栽在苗圃裏。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, equipped with seeds and seedlings seedlings exhibit professional production breeding colony.
sentences.chinese: 同時，配備有苗木展示區和種苗生產繁殖的專業苗圃。

sentences.english: The project has established nurseries and plantations to regenerate the forest.
sentences.chinese: 爲了林區的更新，該項目建立了苗圃和林場。

sentences.english: It also has China's largest bamboo nursery.
sentences.chinese: 安吉縣同時也是中國最大的竹苗圃。

sentences.english: The best place to go for soil is a nursery, however you get the right type.
sentences.chinese: 最好的土壤在苗圃裏，當然要選對品種。

sentences.english: There is difference on income of raising seedlings along with difference of tree species in Songshan national nursery garden.
sentences.chinese: 松山區國有苗圃育苗，由於樹種不同，收入也有差異。

sentences.english: These were classroom decorations at KPMG Zhangqi Hope School.
sentences.chinese: 在張旗畢馬威苗圃希望小學斑房裏的板報。

sentences.english: She will pot plants from her garden and put on her balcony.
sentences.chinese: 她把苗圃裏的植物移植到盆裏擺放在陽臺上。

sentences.english: The flowers of the seed ranch grew still more.
sentences.chinese: 苗圃裏花草長得更盛了。

sentences.english: I began spending hours at the local nursery, studying and choosing seeds and plants.
sentences.chinese: 我開始料理當地的苗圃，研究選擇種子和植株。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, as spring advanced, the flowers in the seed ranch began to come to life .
sentences.chinese: 春深了，苗圃裏的花草又甦醒過來了。

sentences.english: Some of these clouds harbor stellar nurseries that are forming new generations of stars.
sentences.chinese: 某些塵埃雲是孕育新一代恆星的“苗圃”。

sentences.english: The soil differences are significant among forest nurseries because of wide distributing in Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 福建省森林苗圃分佈面廣，各苗圃土壤差異較大。

sentences.english: The soil differences are significant among forest nurseries because of wide distributing in Fujian province.
sentences.chinese: 福建省森林苗圃分佈面廣，各苗圃土壤差異較大。

definition: poplar tree/various trees of genus Populus
Catalpa bungei or Manchurian Catalpa, a tea plant
tree, esp. with recognizable trunk (as opposed to 灌木[guan4 mu4], bush or shrub)
